      • Simplify

        public static Cell[][] Simplify(Cell[][] cells)
        Main simplification method for tables
        Example of usage: TableSimplifier.Simplify(table);
        Parameters:
        cells - - cell matrix of the table
        Returns:
        simplified table as matrix of cells. Return type is Cell[][]

      • DeleteEmptyRows

        public static Cell[][] DeleteEmptyRows(Cell[][] cells)
        Removes empty rows from the table.
        Example of usage: TableSimplifier.DeleteEmptyRows(table);
        Parameters:
        cells - - matrix of cells in a table
        Returns:
        Cell matrix with removed empty cells

      • MergeHeaders

        public static Cell[][] MergeHeaders(Cell[][] cells)
        Function that simplifies complex headers, that have more then one row. Function merges complex header into one row header, by appending higher cells before content of lower cells. At the end copied cells are deleted.
        Parameters:
        cells - - Cell[][] - Table
        Returns:
        cells - Cell[][] - Table with simplified header
